alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 11 at 2:23PM MST until November 11 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph expected. Wind gusts will be higher across the mountains. * WHERE...Metaline Falls, Osburn, Post Falls, Fruitland, Wallace, Coeur d`Alene, Orin-Rice Road, Fourth Of July Pass, Athol, Eastport, Priest River, Tiger, Plummer, Inchelium, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Republic, Springdale-Hunters Road, Genesee, St. Maries, Lookout Pass, Chesaw Road, Worley, Wauconda, Flowery Trail Road, Kellogg, Kettle Falls, Boulder Creek Road, Mullan, Moscow, Northport, Potlatch, Sandpoint, Metaline, Colville, Deer Park, Hayden, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Sherman Pass, Ione, Pinehurst, Bonners Ferry, Chewelah, Newport, Fernwood, Clark Fork, and Dobson Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Trees and limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle
